info.sourceTextContent: Su gran torso de atleta, se movía convulsivamente sobre el lecho, incorporándose unas veces, otras dejándose caer, mientras las manos temblorosas y crispadas se ocupaban instintivamente en tirar de la ropa, que a impulso de sus bruscas sacudidas se le marchaba.
info.suspiciousTextContent: His great, muscular chest heaved on the bed, hitching sometimes, dropping other. His trembling hands clenched instinctively, taking care to pull at the clothes, an impulse now that their sudden shock was ebbing
